title: Fire​
content: </> Midas:Fire( eventName: string,-- a final string added to end of event path, creating a unique event type seriesDuration: number | nil,-- makes it a series event, with this parameter inputting how long without a repeat event is needed to end the series includeEndEvent: boolean | nil-- whether a series end event is fired, or if all the info is bundled into a single start event. ) → Midas This function allows for the rapid construction of Midaii

title: new​
content: </> Midas:new( player: Player ,-- the player the data will be bound to eventKeyPath: string-- an event name similar to a filepath, for example 'Network/Physics/Send' ) → Midas This function allows for the rapid construction of Midaii

title: Midas​
content: </> Service:Midas( ...: any-- all parameters passed to Midas object ) → Midas-- Returns a midas object This function allows for the rapid construction of Midaii

title: GetConfig​
content: </> Service:GetConfig() → table-- Returns the configuration table This function returns the configuration table for editing

title: LoadDefault​
content: </> Service:LoadDefault( player: Player -- the player to hook-up ) → () This begins tracking various useful states for a player

title: init​
content: This item only works when running on the server. Server </> Service:init( titleId: string,-- the playfab TitleId devSecretKey: string-- the playfab developer secret key ) → () This function returns the configuration table for editing
